(OOC: Thank You KSLawdogg, that really helped. I don't mind being called 
firefox or Tav, either name is fine with me.)

Tavatron spun and twisted her staff as she blocked Dark One's plasma blasts 
with her energon blades. She ducked and rolled to the right,  Hiss' fusion 
blasts singed her fur as they flew overhead, barely missing her. Tavatron 
kneeled for a second, trying to make sense of the battle around her. The 
dust and flying debri overwhelmed her senses and stung her optics. She could 
barely make out her attackers, much less avoid their shots.

Tavatron turned her head, the dust momentarily clearing as she slowly got to 
her feet. Suddenly Tavatron flew forward, her staff landing a few feet away. 
She groaned softly as she got to her feet, Breakdown's sonic blast had found 
it's mark. Tavatron unsheathed her drill sword and growled, returning his 
fire with two optic blasts of her own:

"You'll have to do better than that!"

She then turned to Hiss and Dark One and returned their fire with several 
optic blasts at each of them.
